backend/main.mo: Main actor handling user profiles with access control plus restaurant profile, menu, and gallery storage and admin‑gated mutation APIs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that rebuilds menu categories and items with predefined data while preserving structural fields for actor upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two menu‑related features, their affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list summarizing all frontend files and their roles in navigation, sections, admin tools, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global styles defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML bootstrap file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component controlling navigation between sections and showing profile setup for new authenticated users.
Authorization wrapper that blocks non‑admins or unauthenticated users from accessing admin content.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Admin dashboard with tabs for editing restaurant profile, menu, and gallery content, protected by AdminGate.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryEdi: Provides an interface to view, add, edit, and delete gallery image metadata with dialogs and image cards.
frontend/src/components/admin/MenuEditor: Manages menu categories and items, allowing creation, editing, and deletion through dialogs and category/item cards.
frontend/src/components/admin/Restaurant: Displays and updates the restaurant profile, including name, description, owner, phone, and address fields.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A dialog prompting new users to enter and save their name to complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Simple footer displaying attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive top navigation bar with public and admin sections, logo, and authentication button.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact information including owner details and phone number with a call button when available.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Displays a gallery using backend images or defaults, with a lightbox dialog and loading state.
frontend/src/components/sections/Locatio: Shows restaurant location details, Google Maps link, and handles loading state.
frontend/src/components/sections/MenuSec: Renders menu categories and items with search, using backend data or seed fallback and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Overvie: Provides a hero banner and feature cards describing the restaurant, based on profile data.
frontend/src/data/menuSeed.ts: Contains seed menu categories and items used when backend data is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, restaurant profiles, and menu categories via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes using a warm earthy palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage-backed values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, sizing, fonts, and animations using OKLCH variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, architectural notes, and known issues for the app.
